name: ice-stone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an Alola sandshrew into Alola sandslash or an Alola vulpix into Alola ninetales.
short_effect: Evolves an Alola Sandshrew into Alola Sandslash or an Alola Vulpix into Alola Ninetales.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable
snowflake pattern.

A peculiar stone that can make certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable
snowflake pattern.
